Favourite Subjects

I have completed Bachelor of Commerce Honours in Economics at University of Zululand.

Full Stack Development For 4IR

It offers a comprehensive exploration of Full Stack Development, focusing on the tools, technologies, and methodologies relevant to the Fourth Industrial Revolution. Participants will gain practical skills in both frontend and backend development, enabling them to build cutting-edge web applications that leverage 4IR technologies.

4IR Technologies Bootcamp

Provides an in-depth exploration of the transformative technologies driving the Fourth Industrial Revolution. Participants will gain hands-on experience with cutting-edge tools and techniques shaping various industries, preparing them to leverage these advancements in their careers.

Agile Rapid Skills Acquisition

It is designed to equip participants with the mindset, methodologies, and practical techniques needed to rapidly acquire new skills and adapt to changing environments using Agile principles. Participants will learn how to efficiently learn, apply, and iterate on new skills, enabling them to stay competitive in fast-paced industries.
